mapper.select: WITH OJ_LIST AS ( SELECT T1.AS_IST_OJ_NO /*접수번호*/ , T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO /*배정번호*/ , T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , T2.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD /*서비스상태코드 */ , T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID /*접수자사번*/ , T1.PD_GD_CD , T2.SV_CNR_OG_ID /*서비스센터조직ID - 배정정보*/ , T2.ICHR_OG_TP_CD /*담당조직유형코드 - 배정정보*/ , T2.ICHR_PRTNR_NO /*담당파트너번호 - 배정정보*/ , T2.DTM_CH_RSON_DTL_CN AS SPP_PROCS_BZS_CD /*택배사*/ , '1' AS CNTR_DV_CD FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ T1 /* 고객서비스AS설치대상내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ T2 /* 고객서비스AS설치배정내역 */ ON T2.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C0 /*계약기본*/ ON C0.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND C0.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C1 /*계약상세*/ ON C1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_RSG_PROCS_IZ C3 /*계약해지처리내역*/ ON C3.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND C3.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND C3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T2.ICHR_PRTNR_NO = #{session.employeeIDNumber} /* 1: 작업완료 2: 작업대기 */ AND T2.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' UNION ALL SELECT '' AS AS_IST_OJ_NO , T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO AS CST_SV_ASN_NO , T1.CNTR_NO AS CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_SN , '2' AS SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , T2.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD AS WK_PRGS_STAT_CD , T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID , 'A' AS PD_GD_CD , T2.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD || '-' || T2.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO AS SV_CNR_OG_ID , T2.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AS ICHR_OG_TP_CD , T2.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO AS ICHR_PRTNR_NO , '' AS SPP_PROCS_BZS_CD /* BS 택배사 확인 필요 */ , 'N' AS CNTR_DV_CD FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ T1 /* 고객서비스BS대상내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ T2 /* 고객서비스BS배정내역 */ ON T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T2.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C0 /*계약기본*/ ON C0.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND C0.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C1 /*계약상세*/ ON C1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_RSG_PROCS_IZ C3 /*계약해지처리내역*/ ON C3.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND C3.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND C3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T2.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = #{session.employeeIDNumber} AND T2.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' ) SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM OJ_LIST S1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ S3 /*고객서비스작업결과내역, VS106TB*/ ON S3.CST_SV_ASN_NO = S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND S3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ S6 /*고객서비스수행내역*/ ON S6.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND S6.CNTR_SN = S1.CNTR_SN AND S6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 /* 출고구분 */ AND S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = #{cstSvAsnNo} AND S1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND S1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}
